hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ADMIN_USER_EMAIL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The email address for the initial admin user. This should be a Google account.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PROJECT_MIGRATION_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the migration to run, see https://github.com/hms-dbmi/PIC-SURE-Migrations or fork it and add your migration

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_CONTROL_REPOSITORY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This must be the project specific release control git repository that contains the git commit hashes that will be built and deployed.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTBOUND_EMAIL_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The email account name that should be used to send outbound email. The default server is Google's SMTP, so this should be a GMail account. This field is optional

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTBOUND_EMAIL_USER_PASSWORD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The password for the account used to send outbound. This field is optional

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: OPEN
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: PIC-SURE can be used without forcing the user log in. Unauthorized users will have a limited feature set. See more information on Gitbook: TODO_GITBOOK

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DISCOVER
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable the Discover page which allows users to search across all data in the project.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DASHBOARD
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable the Dashboard page which allows users to search across all data in the project.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DIST_EXPLORER
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable the distribution explorer page which creates visualizations of the data.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: ENABLE_GENE_QUERY
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable the genomic filtering UI which guides users creating genomic queries. Enable if HPDS has been loaded with Genomic data.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: ENABLE_SNP_QUERY
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable the genomic filtering UI which guides users creating genomic SNP queries. Enable if HPDS has been loaded with Genomic data.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: VITE_ALLOW_EXPORT_ENABLED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enables the export button on the search results page.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: API
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Shows the user information on how to use the API and allows them to access their LONG_TERM_TOKEN.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: ALLOW_EXPORT
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: This enables the prepare for analysis button which guides the user through your export process. There are a few different settings below to control how the user may receive their data in the end.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DOWNLOAD_AS_CSV
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Allows the user to download their data at the end of the export process as a CSV file.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: SHOW_VARIABLE_EXPORT
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Allow adding export variables via the search results UI.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: SHOW_VARIABLE_HIERARCHY
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Shows the hierarchy button for each search result and enables the hierarchy screen in the export process.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DOWNLOAD_AS_PFB
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Allows the user to download their data at the end of the export process as a PFB file.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: VARIANT_EXPLORER
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable the variant explorer. Only enable if HPDS has been loaded with Genomic data.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EXPLORER_MAX_COUNT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Max amount of data point for the variant explorer.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VARIANT_EXPLORER_EXCLUDE_COLUMNS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Advanced: An array of columns to exclude in the variant explorer. The value must be in an array format, for example: ["AN"]

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: TOUR
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable the tour feature which guides the user through the application.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TOUR_SEARCH_TERM
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The tour preforms a search. You can specify the search term here.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Include_Genomic_Data
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If set to true genomic data must be present or HPDS will fail to start.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Allow_HPDS_Data_Export
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If set to true user will be able to download HPDS Data.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Dataset_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
If this value is left blank the first node of each concept path will be used as the study name ( The dataset ref ).
Example 1: Dataset_Name: Concept Path: 
ode 1
ode 2
ode 3\ Study Name: node 1
Example 2: Dataset_Name: Nhanes Concept Path: 
ode 1
ode 2
ode 3\ Study Name: Nhanes
